domain.title: Domain
domain.description: Select the URL of the Amazon Best Sellers page you want to extract.

depthOfCrawl.title: Depth of crawl
depthOfCrawl.description:
How many subcategories would you like to visit?
Minimum working value is 1, maximum is 3.
Amazon Best Sellers includes 37 main categories. Several of these have another two levels of subcategorisation.
Setting a crawl depth of 2 returns 556 subcategories, each with 100 results and 5-10 more subcategories. That's a LOT of data.
